content:
When pretty tabs to all the pages I came across this issue:

operationdefinition is using example.template and not base like it should.

assume if example is marked false in ig.json then is defaulting to base. if true then is example 

- reference:
    reference: OperationDefinition/example
  description: Limited implementation of the Populate Questionnaire implementation
  name: Populate Questionnaire
  exampleBoolean: false
